name: Space Robot Builder
description:
AI 37XV21 due to an asteroid collision you have been activated to repair base Alpha 21. Gather ressources and take them back to base to allow repairing. Don't forget to gather and consume fuel cell for your own tanks

This is an early playable game that I would like to convert into a full crafting game. As usual I would love comments to help me gather ideas for the next steps and get some motivation to work on it.

The mobile like joystick on the right allow you to turn around. Space activate the thrust. E to gather when you are in reach of a consumable. click on hotbed to consume fuel cells or to release metal and plastic when you are near your base or to empty your inventory.
